8105oe2q.label: Original
8105oe2q.rules:
** All Dungeons (Original) Rules:**
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete all 4 Divine Beasts and obtain their corresponding Champion abilities:
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh (Revali's Gale)
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris (Urbosa's Fury)
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta (Mipha's Grace)
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania (Daruk's Protection)
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

**DLC Rules**

Original DLC disallows the usage of Chamption's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

-  –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

- –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

9qjz6y31.label: Extended
9qjz6y31.rules:
** All Dungeons (Extended) Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete all dungeons and obtain their corresponding reward:
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh (Revali's Gale)
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris (Urbosa's Fury)
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta (Mipha's Grace)
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania (Daruk's Protection)
 - Divine Trial (Master Cycle Zero)
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).
